results.content: Concepts are nicely explained. Theory concepts like multithreading are very well explained with real-world examples which are easy to understand. Code examples do have good coding practices followed.
results.content_html: Concepts are nicely explained. Theory concepts like multithreading are very well explained with real-world examples which are easy to understand. Code examples do have good coding practices followed.

results.content: The concepts are explained in a detailed manner with the right code examples and by considering real-world scenarios. What I liked about the course is, it did not have any theory which we never use while coding and the details provided are up to the point needed for development.  The quizzes also well organized and well thought of. Overall a very good course for learning multithreading using futures in Java.

results.content: No explanation of any code that is written in the lecture, no explanation as to how things are working in the code.
